item.title: Apache Ivy - GWT Tutorial - CodeTab
item.description: IvyDE is Apache Ivy plugin for Eclipse and using IvyDE plugin, with just two steps you will be able to migrate your projects to auto dependency management. Install IvyDE In Eclipse select Help â†’ Install New Software. Add IvyDE update site http://www.apache.org/dist/ant/ivyde/updatesite/. Following softwares are available for installation. Apache Ivy library Apache IvyDE Eclipse plugin Select both and complete the installation. On Eclipse restart, menu bar will have IvyDE’s Resove button.
